events.message: I received my order today, but the product has several scratches and it seems broken on one side. This is very disappointing.
The reported issue has been classified under Product Defect due to customer mentioning scratches and broken parts.
The case has been assigned to one of our product support specialists to assist you further with the defect.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the damage to your product. I'm here to help you resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched and broken areas so we can assess the damage and proceed?
Attached are the pictures of the product showing the scratches and the broken edge as requested.
Thank you for the photos. We can send you a replacement at no additional cost or offer a full refund if you prefer.
I would like to receive a replacement since I still want the product but in perfect condition. Thank you for your help.
A replacement order has been processed and will be shipped to you within 3 business days. We apologize again for the inconvenience.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the replacement product and that it meets your expectations.
Yes, I received the replacement yesterday and it is in perfect condition. Thank you for the great support!
Closing the case as the issue has been fully resolved and the customer has confirmed satisfaction with the replacement product.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on the support process for this product defect.
